Zamorak warriors are the warriors of ZMI and currently guard the Ourania Altar, found at the end of the Ourania Cave.

They can be safespotted using the various small lava vents in the cave, however it is suggested to wait until they are tolerant as the nearby Zamorak rangers and mages can attack you.

Zamorak warriors are commonly killed for their rune scimitar drop, having a significantly higher drop rate than other common monsters such as fire giants.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The level 84 Zamorak warrior appears to be wearing a red coloured Guthan's helm, splitbark body and legs, a heraldic kiteshield bearing the symbol of Zamorak, and a sword similar to the one the Knights of Saradomin wield in the God Wars Dungeon.
  • The level 85 Zamorak warrior appears to be wearing a red coloured rock-shell helm, a spined body and gloves, granite legs, granite boots, dragon longsword and a dragon sq shield.

  • Zamorak crafter

'''Zamorak warriors''' are the warriors of [[Zamorak Magical Institute|ZMI]] and currently guard the [[Ourania Altar]], found at the end of the [[Ourania Cave]].

They can be [[Safespotting|safespotted]] using the various small lava vents in the cave, however it is suggested to wait until they are [[tolerant]] as the nearby [[Zamorak ranger]]s and [[Zamorak mage|mages]] can attack you.

Zamorak warriors are commonly killed for their [[rune scimitar]] drop, having a significantly higher drop rate than other common monsters such as [[fire giant]]s.

==Trivia==
*The level 84 Zamorak warrior appears to be wearing a red coloured [[Guthan's helm]], [[splitbark body]] and [[Splitbark legs|legs]], a [[Heraldic kiteshield (Construction)|heraldic kiteshield]] bearing the symbol of [[Zamorak]], and a sword similar to the one the [[Knight of Saradomin|Knights of Saradomin]] wield in the [[God Wars Dungeon]].
*The level 85 Zamorak warrior appears to be wearing a red coloured [[rock-shell helm]], a [[spined body]] and [[Spined gloves|gloves]], [[granite legs]], [[granite boots]], [[dragon longsword]] and a [[dragon sq shield]].
